title: Leek soup
intro: A soup is the perfect way to use those dark green tops of leeks, as they will tenderize thoroughly.

insSteps: Add oil to a pot, stir the sliced leek in for 10Â minutes.
Add some warm broth, and let it cook until the leaves are soft and tender.
Let the pot cool down a bit before blending with an immersion blender.
Add mustard, soy sauce, salt, pepper and cream to taste.
